SELECT u.id AS user_id, u.nickname AS user_nickname, u.head_photo AS user_head_photo, umsl.id AS user_music_list_id, umsl.music_list_name AS user_music_list_name, umsl.music_list_photo AS user_music_list_photo, umsl.intro AS user_music_list_intro, umsl.generate_time AS user_music_list_created_time, nouml.num_of_music_in_user_music_list AS num_of_music_in_user_music_list FROM user u, user_music_list umsl, ( SELECT uml.id AS user_music_list_id, count(CASE WHEN miuml.music_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) AS num_of_music_in_user_music_list FROM user_music_list uml LEFT JOIN music_in_user_music_list miuml ON uml.id = miuml.user_music_list_id GROUP BY uml.id ORDER BY uml.id ASC ) nouml WHERE u.id = umsl.user_id AND umsl.id = nouml.user_music_list_id
AND umsl.music_list_name LIKE concat('%', #{user_music_list_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
